content:
Berries are a great choice for a delicious and refreshing dessert! I'd be happy to suggest some fantastic fruit-based dessert recipes that feature berries as the star ingredient. And, lucky you, I can even incorporate your leftover coffee syrup into one of the recipes!

Here are three berry-licious dessert ideas for you to consider:

**Recipe 1: Strawberry Coffee Crisp**
Use your leftover coffee syrup to make a mocha-flavored strawberry crisp! This dessert combines sweet strawberries with the richness of coffee, topped with a crunchy oat and brown sugar crumble.

**Recipe 2: Blueberry Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins**
Moist and flavorful blueberry muffins infused with a hint of lemon zest and topped with a crunchy poppy seed streusel. Perfect for a weekend brunch or breakfast treat.

**Recipe 3: Raspberry Basil Sorbet**
Beat the heat with a refreshing and light sorbet made with fresh raspberries, basil leaves, and a touch of sugar. This unique flavor combination is sure to impress your friends and family!

Which one of these recipes catches your eye (or taste buds)? Let me know, and I'll provide you with the detailed recipe and instructions!
